methods.name: CreateDynamicShortcut
methods.description: Creates a shortcut with the given name, icon, starting screen and value.

methods.name: BuildDynamicShortcut
methods.description: Create list with information about the dynamic shortcut.

methods.name: CreatePinnedShortcut
methods.description: Creates and requests to pin a shortcut with the given name, icon, starting screen and value.

methods.name: RemoveShortcut
methods.description: Removes the shortcut with the given id.

methods.name: DisableShortcut
methods.description: Disable a shortcut with the given id.

methods.name: EnableShortcut
methods.description: Enable a shortcut with the given id.

methods.name: IsDynamicShortcutExist
methods.description: Checks whether a dynamic shortcut exists by id.

methods.name: IsPinnedShortcutExist
methods.description: Checks whether a pinned shortcut exists by id.

methods.name: IsRateLimited
methods.description: Checks if creating shortcuts is rate-limited by the user's device.

methods.name: IsShortcutsSupported
methods.description: Checks if the device supports shortcuts (SDK => 25 or higher).

methods.name: IsPinnedShortcutsSupported
methods.description: Checks whether the user's launcher supports pinning shortcuts.

name: QuickShortcuts
helpString: Creates home screen shortcuts and app shortcuts.
